{"step_by_step_thinking": "Maturity onset diabetes of the young (MODY) is a group of several conditions characterized by diabetes that typically begins in adolescence or early adulthood. The most common form of MODY, MODY3, is caused by mutations in the HNF1A gene, which provides instructions for making a protein called hepatocyte nuclear factor-1.", "answer_choice": "B.
